tweets.text: @ImogenRadford @EnvAgency We can only map known sources of pollution. There are many more including septic tanks, domestic misconnections and agricultural runoff that can't be mapped.

Almost 500(!) people joined our webinar last month on the #flood #hydrology roadmap for the UK w/ Sean Longfield @EnvAgency Rob Lamb @JBATrust Nick Reynard @UK_CEH & @hancloke @UniofReading

If you missed it, you can catch up now on our YouTube channelüì∫ https://t.co/C12FtzGMBn

urls.title: U.S. Army ERDC
urls.description: Welcome to the official YouTube page of the U.S. Army Engineer Research and Development Center. The U.S. Army Engineer Research and Development Center (ERDC) is the premier research and development facility for the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. Recognized as one of the most diverse engineering and scientific organizations in the world, the organization is home to subject-matter experts in a variety of mission areas including Soldier support, military installations, environmental research, water resources and information technology. ERDC is made up of seven laboratories: 1. Coastal and Hydraulics Laboratory (CHL) 2. Cold Regions Research and Engineering Laboratory (CRREL) 3. Construction Engineering Research Laboratory (CERL) 4. Environmental Laboratory (EL) 5. Geotechnical and Structures Laboratory (GSL) 6. Information Technology Laboratory (ITL) 7. Geospatial Research Laboratory (GRL)
